name: The Northwestern Corner Of The Ledge
description:
You stand, swaying out from the ledge, with only a couple of inches of
safe, solid ledge under your feet.  The ledge continues to the east but not
back south.  It seems that the ledge is too narrow to turn on so you'll have
to continue forward.

exits.description: The Abyss lies down there.  Who knows what might lurk down there?
exits.keywords: rock step edge~ 1 -1 7279 E edge odd-looking~ This is truly a weird piece of craftsmanship in your eyes.  The edge seems to form a step leading down, but WHAT a STEP DOWN.  The Abyss opens down there  leading to seemingly total destruction.

extra_descriptions.description:
It looks as if it can be opened in a door-like fashion.  Maybe this will lead
the way down.
